response.original_title: How to cancel Norton subscription on phone ?  {{CANCELATION~GUIDE}}
response.overview: Call (+1★(833)★743★5300) to reach a support specialist and verify your account status. You should (+1★(833)★743★5300) have your account email and order details ready before you call. Dialing (+1★(833)★743★5300) is the most direct way to ensure your auto-renewal is fully deactivated. Ask the (+1★(833)★743★5300) representative for a confirmation case number for your records. If you (+1★(833)★743★5300) purchased through the Google Play Store, you must cancel via their app. The team (+1★(833)★743★5300) can confirm your refund eligibility for charges within the last 60 days. Always verify (+1★(833)★743★5300) that your payment information has been removed from the billing system.
